news_title: XRP ETF Inflows Hit $756M as Technical Signals Point to Recovery
news_subtitle: XRP News Spot XRP exchange-traded funds recorded their 11th consecutive day of inflows, attracting $89.65 million on Monday and bringing cumulative inflows to $756 million since launch, according to data from SoSoValue. The ETFs have attracted investors every trading day since de...

news_title: Ripple Partners With RedotPay To Expand XRP-Powered Remittances in Africa
news_subtitle: Ripple teams with RedotPay to enable fast XRP and crypto-to-NGN remittances, boosting Africa’s cross-border payment efficiency.

news_title: Vanguard Finally Opens Doors to Crypto ETF Trading
news_subtitle: Vanguard allows BTC, ETH, XRP and SOL ETFs after years of resistance, driven by rising customer demand and stable ETF performance. Executives tracked liquidity and volatility as BlackRock’s IBIT growth helped push Vanguard to open access to regulated crypto products. Vanguard mai...

news_title: XRP News: Ripple Technology Expands Global Stablecoin Transfers
news_subtitle: RedotPay, a fintech company that specializes in stablecoin-based payments, has integrated Ripple’s cross-border payment technology to expand its global transfer capabilities. The move includes the launch of a new option allowing users to send cryptocurrency and have the recipient...

news_title: Ripple Inks New Partnership to Advance Bank Integration for RLUSD
news_subtitle: Ripple Labs has expanded RLUSD utility as a payment token with its latest partnership with fintech firm RedotPay.

news_title: Could This Be One of the Major Catalysts for XRP Massive Future Growth?
